Text: HiPST Hi Jon My name is Lawrence Truong Im a friend of Geri Greenall Actually she was one of my CPMT assistants in my last year at Scurfield I was in contact with Geri recently and she suggested that I contact you with regard to my interest in energy trading This is the primary reason that Im writing to you today is to ask you for some advice on the energy trading business I was hoping that we could get together for coffee or a drink sometime to discuss your business I understand that you are completing the CFA this year by writing level I am also writing level this year in Calgary I know that with the exam looming ahead that youll be extremely busy preparing so if your schedule permits maybe we can meet sometime the week after the exam In anycase thanks for your time and good luck with the exam I hope to hear back from you If you wish I can be reached at Cheers and have a nice day Lawrence Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices
